WorkItem.ClosedComment: Crit from Agility/Intellect wasn't being displayed.Have performed a temporary fix until I have a chance to finish revamping the display.
WorkItem.Description:
So I don't forget this:
Crit percentage values aren't matching with Battle.Net values.
Crit Rating values are accurate.

Comments.Message: Note that the battle.net values are from your gear and base stats ONLY. For example, a draenei will show 1% less hit on battle.net, as it only shows your gear hit.
Rawr was showing less than Battle.net in the cases I looked at.  Think I have fixed the main problem, just need to double check.
